Texts.Eng: Eight crew members! Congratulations - you now qualify for the Eagle License! ^green;Visit Penguin Pete^reset; with ^orange;8 Upgrade Modules^reset; to upgrade your ship.
Texts.Por: Oito tripulantes! Parabéns - agora você se qualifica para a Eagle License! ^green; Visite Pinguim Pete^reset; com ^orange;8 Upgrade Modules^reset; para atualizar sua nave.
